participant_1.name: Jim
participant_1.personality: Jim is a friendly and caring individual who enjoys helping others.
participant_1.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i am a retired gym teacher. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i was poor growing up.

participant_2.name: Lena
participant_2.personality: Lena is creative and enthusiastic, with a passion for baking and knitting.
participant_2.background: i love to bake cookies. i have a dogs. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion.
